Name: Description
Description: A description of the content and purpose of the Vocabulary. May be expressed in multiple languages and supports the use of structured content.

Name: URI
Description: URI to external resource providing information about the vocabulary (general description, main web page).

Name: XML-URI
Description: URI to the vocabulary represented as an XML document.

Name: Scheme
Description: Textual description of the XML scheme in which the classification is written.

Name: SchemeURI
Description: URI to the XML scheme used in the vocabulary (DTD or XML Schema for the XML document above; schemes like DDI, Claset, Neuchatel, and DocBook). Typically, this will be an XML namespace.

Name: Comments
Description: Information for the user regarding the reasons for use of the vocabulary and appropriate usage constraints.
